list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small round or roundish mark, differing in color or texture from the surface around it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: ladybugs have black spots on their red wing covers
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bọ rùa có đốm đen trên vỏ cánh đỏ của họ
một điểm kín đáo tốt đẹp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: denoting a system of trading in which commodities or currencies are delivered and paid for immediately after a sale.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giao dịch tại thị trường giao ngay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: see, notice, or recognize (someone or something) that is difficult to detect or that one is searching for.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Andrew spotted the ad in the paper
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Andrew phát hiện quảng cáo trong bài báo

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the velvet was spotted with stains
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Velvet được phát hiện bằng vết bẩn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: place (a billiard ball or football) on its designated starting point.
